title: Topic 004 Question 003
body: You have a Microsoft Sentinel workspace that has a default data retention period of 30 days. The workspace contains two custom tables as shown in the following table.
Each table ingested two records per day during the past 365 days.
You build KQL statements for use in analytic rules as shown in the following table.
For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
